page.title: 04Events
page.content: The Harbottle Show Harbottle Show is popular in the area.There are displays of School writing,drawing and modelling. There is also a large school display of a project we have been doing in school. A large tent houses entries of flowers, vegetables, produce and crafts.Of special interest is the class for dressed sticks, carved out of sheep's horn or wood. Outside there are Sheep Dog Trials and sheep classes. There is a competition in grading sheep and guessing the weight of a sheep. Sports for children include flat, sack(boys), egg and spoon(girls) and three-legged races.For the men there are flat races of 100m and 400m,sack race, bolster and bar, and Cumberland and Westmorland wrestling. There is also a quoits competition.
